summary: Portfolio website hosted at https://HamzaAliportfolio0035.icp0.io with a custom domain name, and plans to support direct resume download via a "Download Resume" button.
architectural_notes: Project publicly accessible via URL: https://HamzaAliportfolio0035.icp0.io

existing_features.title: Update the frontend "Download Resume" button to download the resume from the backend download route (instead of /assets/resume/Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf), while keeping the existing disabled/loading behavior when the resume is unavailable.

new_feature_requests.summary: Upload resume file to backend and make "Download Resume" button trigger direct file download
Store the resume PDF in the Motoko backend (stable state) and expose an HTTP download route that returns the PDF with appropriate headers so the browser downloads it as a file.
Seed the backend with the current resume PDF named "Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf" so it is available immediately after deployment without manual upload steps.
